job.title: Staff Software Engineer, Conversation
job.description: strongThe RolebrstrongWere hiring a talented Staff Software Engineer for the Conversation Engineering team to join our growing team where youll help build and scale the intelligent Chatbot Engine that is interpreting the worlds health sensor data and empowering people to live fitter and happier livesbrbrstronguWhat Youll Dobrustrongul li Define and review projects by collaborating with other engineering teams execs dev ops and the product teamli liMy team is building a Chatbot Engineli li Build new features refactor and scale existing backend systems that ingest and process data from mobile devicesli li Work on our new backend systems using state of the art technologies that provide the best possible user experience to our usersli li Rewrite and rearchitect our existing services from other languages such as Java and Python to Typescriptli li Build the tools and infrastructure that will easily allow us to design and create user interactionsli liInstrument systems to make metrics available in real time to other teams like dev ops analytics data engineering and other engineering teamsli li Develop everything new in Typescript Node Nextjs DynamoDB and Kubernetes li liUphold and help define best practices and collaborate across teams mentor junior engineers li li Be quality driven write fast automated tests to achieve a very high close to 100 code coverage with high qualityli li Follow and better define coding guidelines to ensure that the security and privacy of our user data is ensured li brbrulstronguWhat Youll Needbrustrongul li Expertise with data modeling and performance tuning data systems and access li liExpertise with OO and functional programming or functional programming languages such as Haskell or Scala li li Expertise with designing DSLs or APIs li liExperience with integrating machine learning models into applicationsli li Strong sense of empathy for end users li li Ability to work closely with product and designers to create optimal solutions and trade offs li liExperience building highly scalable high volume and fast systems li li Experience with tooling that assists with optimizing and troubleshooting systems li liAwareness of most current best practices tools and newest technologies li liKnowledge of AWS technologies such as DynamoDB Lambdas Serverless li liCommunication skills capacity to work crossfunctionally with both nontechnical and highly technical team members li li Wellversed in Git and microservice architectureli liExpertise with Nodejs and Typescript or JavaScript is a plusli liExpertise with DyanmoDB or other NoSQL technologies is a plus li li Knowledge or expertise in Kubernetes is a plusli li Familiarity with React or Nextjs is a big plusli brbrulstronguEducation And Experiencebrustrongul liMS in Computer Science or equivalent in a STEM fieldli li1015 years experience as a software engineer li li Experience in sprint planning and working with Agile methodologiesli brulstrongJOIN USbrstrongLark is a companion that lives on the users phone and provides daily coaching guidance and health insights to users Developed with the expertise of worldleading health professionals we are on a mission to make the world a healthier happier place Come join our teambrbrstronguAbout LarkbrbrustrongLark is the worlds largest AIenabled healthcare provider delivering virtual care and connected health devices that help people stay in control of conditions such as diabetes and heart disease Were on a mission to improve the health and happiness of the 1 billion people globally who are living with or at risk for a chronic health condition Our AI enabled programs were the first to achieve clinical outcomes matching those of inperson healthcare professionals showing the ability to deliver care at a fraction of the cost and at enormous scale brbrstrongWorking at Lark brstrongLark offers the option to work remotely in the United States For Colorado Applicants only minimum annual salary is 140000 minimum salary varies for other geographies You may also be offered a bonus stock options andor benefits We have identified the core period of the day during which all employees are required to work for scheduled meetings syncs scrums between 10 am and 3 pm Pacific time The company is headquartered in Mountain View CAbrbremLark is an Equal
